name: Connect the numbers pro
description:
[Game introduction]
Attention!This is an addictive puzzle game, simple but not boring, whether you are children, or elderly adults, I believe you will like this one: Connect the Numbers!

Take a look at this beautiful and colorful puzzle game, you just need to move your finger over the Numbers and connect them to merge them into higher Numbers, can you make 2048?Or is it much higher than 2048?Oh yes, this game is challenging too!
